title: Chelsea transfer news: Third bid for Craig Gordon to be made | Metro News
text:
Chelsea to launch another bid for Celtic goalkeeper Craig Gordon in January gossip Metro Sport Reporter for Metro.co.uk Thursday 23 Feb 2017 4:10 pm Chelsea will launch another bid for Celtic goalkeeper Craig Gordon. (Getty Images) 
Chelsea will make another move for Celtic goalkeeper Craig Gordon in the summer transfer window, according to reports. 
The Evening Standard claims that if Asmir Begovic joins Bournemouth as expected, the Premier League leaders will submit another offer to the Scottish champions. 
Chelsea had bids of £3 million and £4 million rejected for the 34-year-old in the January transfer window. 
Celtic had planned contract talks with Gordon but they will not hold discussions until the end of the season. Gordon is reportedly keen on joining Chelsea. (Getty Images) 
Celtic have a one-year option on Gordon’s contract, which means that Chelsea may be required to pay a higher fee to land their target.
